original_title: Former state minister Pilleyan arrives at CID
original_body_lines: Former state minister Sivanesathurai Chandrakanthan alias Pilleyan has arrived at the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) this morning (20).

He had arrived at the CID following a summon to provide a statement regarding the controversial documentary aired by British television network ‘Channel 4’ on the 2019 Easter Sunday terror attacks in Sri Lanka.
